name: Sky Road
description: Sky Road is a casual game for all ages. It does not take much effort. In a calm atmosphere, choose an emotion for yourself and take a ride along the celestial road, collecting coins. The further you pass the more reward.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB Storage: 100 MB available space
